page.title: 09Bullenshaw House,Hemsworth
page.content: Bullenshaw Old People's Home used to be a farm. We interviewed three ladies who said they liked the home and company very much. They looked happy and well cared for. They had strong opinions on what they liked and disliked, for instance,they liked old money, modern music and modern fashion, but they did not like Punk hairdos. They said that the teachers at their schools weren't very strict but instead the pupils had to do a daily drill. They were taught English and maths but no cookery. The ladies left school at thirteen and got jobs in factories. Men worked in the pit or in a factory.
